name: py-pyqt-builder

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: The PEP 517 compliant PyQt build system.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-sip
dependencies.description: A Python bindings generator for C/C++ libraries.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-pyqt5
dependent_to.description:
PyQt is a set of Python v2 and v3 bindings for The Qt Company's Qt
application framework and runs on all platforms supported by Qt
including Windows, OS X, Linux, iOS and Android. PyQt5 supports Qt v5.

dependent_to.name: py-pyqt6
dependent_to.description: PyQt6 is a comprehensive set of Python bindings for Qt v6.

dependent_to.name: qgis
dependent_to.description:
QGIS is a free and open-source cross-platform desktop geographic
information system application that supports viewing, editing, and
analysis of geospatial data.

dependent_to.name: qscintilla
dependent_to.description:
QScintilla is a port to Qt of Neil Hodgson's Scintilla C++ editor
control.
